name: Root
summary: Select your profile to begin course suggestions.

children.name: School Student
children.summary: I am a student in school, from grade 1 to 12.

children.name: Robotics
children.summary: Explore robotics courses for high school.

children.name: Course1 Details
children.summary: Learn the basics of robotics with practical projects.
children.description: This course covers introductory concepts in robotics for high school students, including sensors, programming, and basic electronics. By the end, students will have built simple robots and understood foundational principles.

children.name: Course2 Details
children.description: This course introduces advanced robotics concepts such as machine vision, control systems, and AI integration in robotics for senior school students.

children.summary: Computer programming courses for high school.

children.name: AI
